posts.post_content: Great card and I’m all for it, but the sickness theme and top down design make it not a “tom”. Always loved Pestilence. (Planar Chaos cards were divided into neat alternate universe things, vs “toms”—see af156.) I think Pyrohemia makes total sense as an alternate universe card but Pestilence is the “right” card—as a disease, it can only live while there are creatures out.
posts.html:
Great card and I’m all for it, but the sickness theme and top down design make it not a “tom”. Always loved Pestilence. (Planar Chaos cards were divided into neat alternate universe things, vs “toms”—see af156.) I think Pyrohemia makes total sense as an alternate universe card but Pestilence is the “right” card—as a disease, it can only live while there are creatures out.
